column5: Thinking of heading up to simcoe this weekend for spring whities, do they come in close enough that you can shore fish them, I know that most people vertical jig for them which I wouldn't be able to do from shore, could I try for them from jackson's point?
They are closed until the second Sat in May.  Read the regs man.
just read them listed as opened all year for zone 16? never mind saw the exception
I've been itching to get out as well..  Gotta wait another month!  Ah well, perch will keep my occupied I'm sure.
Well I guess perch will be good too,  could I get them in kempenfit right now or is that too deep?
Most guys have been getting them in shallow, lots of dinks though.
Now I'm thinking between duclos and sibbald points looks pretty shallow there.
